{"step_by_step_thinking": "A disinfectant is a substance that is applied to non-living objects to destroy microorganisms that are living on the objects. 1-2% Cetrimide is a disinfectant used in surgical procedures. 100% Alcohol is too strong to be used as a disinfectant, it needs to be diluted to be effective. 2% Lysol is a common household disinfectant. 5% Chloroxylene is a disinfectant used in dental procedures.", "answer_choice": "B"}
